Description.Name: Storage Space
Description.Details: Reduces the monthly upkeep of all stored inventory items by 5%. This includes equipment, weapons, salvaged 'Mechs and stored 'Mechs. The Argo's internal storage is just enough for day-to-day survival, but we'll need to develop an inventory system optimised for the Argo and not just a standard DropShip. This ship's layout and functions are so different from standard that a new unified inventory system needs to be developed from scratch.

AssignedCastDescription: Our internal storage is having enough roadblocks as is, Commander. I can't make it from Engineering to the Mech Bay without tripping over our loose ends and spares. We're managing so much poorly placed inventory right now that crews are losing productivity just trying to find the tools and resources they need.
